## Checklist

- [ ] The project is open-source (OSS/FLOSS)
- [ ] The project has an OSI-approved license
- [ ] The project is directly related to Traditional Mongolian Script
- [ ] The project is functional and working
- [ ] The project has proper documentation
- [ ] I have searched for duplicates in the existing list
- [ ] I am the project author OR I have permission to submit this
